name: Five Nights At Konto's
description:
This is a Fnaf inspired fan game for the Streamer kontoletzplay made in RPG Maker2003.

This is my second ever project in RPG Maker, and I never actually thought I would even complete this game. I started work on this game in July of 2022, and finished it in December of 2022. With the main game done, my goal with this project going forward  is to add in all the extra features and ideas I scrapped and abandoned through development.

This game has been an idea since 2020, until a friend told me to finally make it happen. So I did.

All characters in this game are based off actual people in the community.

Basic Controls:
[ARROW KEYS] to Move Around

[Z] or [SPACE] to Interact and Accept

[X] or [BACK SPACE] to Decline

In Office Controls:
[LEFT] and [RIGHT] Arrow Keys to look around the office and switch between Cameras

[DOWN] Arrow Key to enter Cameras

[UP] Arrow Key exit Cameras

[SPACE] to Open/Close doors
